subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. basketball tournament has avoided that inglorious moment in which a referee’s mistake leaves a lasting scar on a championship. But that could change if Georgetown or Ohio State wins the title.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. basketball tournament has avoided that inglorious moment in which a referee’s mistake leaves a lasting scar on a championship. But that could change if Georgetown or Ohio State wins the title.
